name: The Monkey Mini Quest
description:
El Peskito the Parrot, a henchbird of the wicked Monkey, has kidnapped your younger sister.  It's time to spring into action!

Complete three deceptively hard minigames (all traps laid by Monkey) to free her!

There wil be danger, adventure, and...falling bananas!

Do you possess the wit, skills, and reflexes you need to succeed in this epic quest?

Liluo.io link: https://liluo.io/instant-builds/bd231cce-3bf3-4081-9e52-b477fe0ff527

Created by BookBerryTea, CheerySmile, and Scriptor74
